text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Come on, girls. Since we're all here, 
we might as well shoot the breeze～

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Hmm～…… Tough nuts to crack, these two～

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
How about if I listen to aaall your problems 
and worries? I can be like, your big sister 
or something!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Are you looking to roleplay or something…? 
Having one elder sister is enough for me.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
I already have a sister figure too, so I'm good. 
Although, she's the same person Brian was 
referring to.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha, Hayahide, right? I can totes see her 
doting on you two like a classic big sister.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
But man, having someone like that is pretty 
reassuring, isn't it? When all's said and done, 
you realize you can always rely on them～

text_block_list.name: Brian & Taishin
text_block_list.text: Exa…… Wait, no! Don't pull me into this!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
See? You two like to talk after aaaaall～! 
Come on, loosen up～♪
